mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENU_MGT(MU_ID, MU_NM, MU_CD, MU_UPCD, MU_SN, ADMIN_YN, USER_YN) VALUES ('4',#{menuNm},#{menuCd},#{menuUpCd},#{menuSn},#{adminYn},#{userYn})
mapper.select: SELECT MU_ID as menuId, MU_NM as menuNm, MU_CD as menuCd, MU_UPCD as menuUpCd, MU_SN as menuSn, ADMIN_YN as adminYn, USER_YN as userYn FROM MENU_MGT
